r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n:
## Tracer
### Fixed - Fix: MongoDBIntegration condition typo #2884 - Fix crash in profiler when span stack switch causes GC run #2885 - Support build with disabled zend signals #2886 - Send git tags via remote config #2890 - Fix memory leak with sidecar trace sender #2875
## Profiling
### Fixed - Fix profiler ZTS build on alpine #2887
## Application Security Management
### Fixed - AppSec: improve behavior with empty DD_SERVICE/DD_ENV #2888
